it.unipr.netsec.simulator.scheduler

Class VirtualClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zoolu.util.Clock
      • it.unipr.netsec.simulator.scheduler.VirtualClock

  • public class VirtualClock
extends Clock
    A virtual clock. It provides methods for getting the current time and for creating timers.
